works.description:
The album, named Lucie Slintakova's
Public  
Gallery, contains scanned images of the first page of 89 copyrighted  
knitting patterns, the majority of which belong to Alan Dart. From the  
comments you will see she regularly exchanges the complete patterns with  
other members, which infringes Alan's copyright, and is illegal. Several
of  
the patterns are also available for sale from Alan's website  so this also
 
creates a loss of earnings. Apart from this, many of them are of licensed 

characters so this also infringes the copyright of the publishers and  
licence holders concerned. Below is the album's url.
